Play:
The Pine Tree on the River Bank
(Kishi no himematsu kutsuwa kagami / 岸姫松轡鑑)

Written By: Toyotake Ōritsu (豊竹応律) , Wakatake Fuemi (若竹笛躬) , Fukumatsu Tōsuke (福松藤助) , Asada Icchō (浅田一鳥) , Koku Zōsu (黒蔵主) , Namiki Eisuke (並木永輔)

First Staged: 1762

Reference: Keene, Donald, Bunraku: The Art of the Japanese Puppet Theatre (Tokyo: Kodansha International, 1973); Bunraku September 1972 Performance Program; Kishino Himematsu Kutsuwa Kagami (S.l.: s.n., 1762), bibliographic record retrieved from NACSIS Webcat.

Performances:

September 1972: The Pine Tree on the River Bank

Characters:

Asahina (Asahina Saburō Yoshihide / 朝比奈三郎義秀)

Hyoe (Iihara Hyōe / 飯原兵衛)

Fujimaki (Tsuma Fujimaki / 妻藤巻)

Yomosaku (Hyakushō Yomosaku / 百姓与茂作)

Hayatonosuke (Iihara Hayatonosuke / 飯原隼人之助)

Osoyo (Musume Osoyo / 娘おそよ)

Tsukasa (Tsukasa Hime / 司姫)
